ðŸ“– Summary: Octelium is a self-hosted, unified zero trust secure access platform written in Go. It offers functionalities including remote access VPN, ZTNA/BeyondCorp architecture, API/AI gateway, PaaS, and homelab infrastructure, providing secure access to resources via WireGuard/QUIC tunnels and context-aware access control.
